name: Human Insulin
short_description: A hormone that regulates blood glucose levels. Simple structure with 51 amino acids, ideal for learning protein basics.

name: Hemoglobin (Beta Chain)
short_description: Oxygen-transport protein in red blood cells. Shows how proteins bind small molecules. 146 amino acids.

name: Lysozyme
short_description: Enzyme that breaks down bacterial cell walls. Found in tears and saliva. 129 amino acids. Classic teaching protein.
